section.title: Changing Priority Order of Domains
section.para: Functions are executed depending on the order of Domain priority. Use this procedure to change the priority order of domains.

procedure.title: To Change the Priority Order of Domains

step.para: Navigate to AutomateExplorer. The default view is the Datastore.
Select the Domains you want to change the priority order for.

Click
(Configuration), then
(Edit Priority Order of Domains).
The list of Domains selected shows up. Note that you cannot change the priority of locked Domains and therefore locked Domains do not show up on the list.
Select one or more consecutive groups to move up or down to change their priority as required.
